mapper.insert: insert into group_buy_order(team_Id, activity_Id, source, channel, original_Price, deduction_Price, pay_Price, target_Count, complete_Count, lock_Count, status, create_time, update_time) values(#{teamId}, #{activityId}, #{source}, #{channel}, #{originalPrice}, #{deductionPrice}, #{payPrice}, #{targetCount}, #{completeCount}, #{lockCount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update group_buy_order set lock_Count = lock_Count + 1,update_time=now() where team_Id = #{teamId} and lock_count<target_count
update group_buy_order set lock_count = lock_count-1,update_time=now() where team_id=#{time_id} and lock_count>0
